name: Shrutii
greetingText: I really like your name btw😍❤!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do🥱.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something🤔🤔
outroText: Okay, Here is your birthday present🎁🎁.Do not dare to open it otherwise you will fall in love for me😀.Just keep this wrapped in your heart.
replayText: My feelings for you grow stronger by each passing day. I cannot imagine a day in my life without loving you truly,madly and deeply. Once again Happy Birthday!
